vertex_one.title: Vertex One HMI | Modernization & Predictive Maintenance
vertex_one.challenge: Modernize a mission-critical gas detection interface for semiconductor manufacturing
vertex_one.discovery: Conducted field research and workshops to understand 'high-containment' user constraints
vertex_one.strategy: Developed a 'Fail-Safe' design strategy utilizing digital twins for predictive maintenance
vertex_one.outcome: Introduced 'Point Mapping' and 'Alarm Intelligence' features that increased operator productivity
vertex_one.details: Generated divergent HMI concepts to solve for high-risk 'pump maintenance' scenarios, using wireframes to visualize complex logic before converging on a solution.

ewas.title: Enterprise Worker & Asset Safety (EWAS) | Discovery & Strategic Pivot
ewas.challenge: Unify fragmented legacy safety tools into a single intelligent platform
ewas.discovery: Mapped the entire ecosystem and identified user friction in device setup. Conducted deep-dive current state audits of fragmented legacy tools, mapping redundant paths and friction points.
ewas.strategy: Pivoted to a 'Guided Onboarding' strategy based on CTO guidance and workshop insights. Defined strategic vision for NFC/QR-based device assignment.
ewas.outcome: Delivered a unified platform serving 80K+ users with a 20% reduction in configuration time
ewas.details: Facilitated multi-day discovery workshops with cross-functional stakeholders (Engineering, Product, Field Services) to deconstruct service inefficiencies. Synthesized qualitative data from Voice of Customer (VOC) sessions using AI clustering to identify high-value opportunities.

transmission_risk.title: Honeywell Transmission Risk Air Monitor
transmission_risk.challenge: Design air quality monitoring system for healthcare environments during pandemic
transmission_risk.discovery: Research on healthcare facility needs and air quality monitoring requirements
transmission_risk.strategy: Created integrated mobile and web solution for real-time air quality monitoring
transmission_risk.outcome: Won iF Design Award 2021 for innovative healthcare IoT solution
transmission_risk.details: Designed comprehensive air monitoring solution with mobile and web interfaces for healthcare facilities to monitor transmission risk during the COVID-19 pandemic.

ecomdash.title: Ecomdash Multi-Channel Analytics Platform
ecomdash.challenge: Unify data from 15+ shopping APIs into a single decision-making dashboard
ecomdash.discovery: Analyzed onboarding friction using Hotjar and Google Analytics, creating journey maps that identified critical drop-off points
ecomdash.strategy: Introduced design thinking frameworks and created unified analytics platform
ecomdash.outcome: 20% increase in conversion rates. Contributed to acquisition by Endurance Group (Constant Contact)
ecomdash.details: Designed a multi-channel analytics platform unifying data from Amazon, Shopify, eBay, and 12+ other shopping APIs into a single decision-making dashboard. Established the design strategy that contributed to the acquisition by Endurance Group.

wells_fargo.title: Wells Fargo Enterprise Audit Applications
wells_fargo.challenge: Optimize enterprise audit applications in highly regulated financial environment
wells_fargo.discovery: Collaborated in Agile environment to align strategic requirements between Product Management and Engineering
wells_fargo.strategy: Created high-fidelity interactive prototypes to facilitate stakeholder storytelling
wells_fargo.outcome: Reduced rework and clarified scope early in discovery process. Secured alignment on complex audit workflows
wells_fargo.details: Driven solution discovery for enterprise audit applications within a highly regulated financial environment. Influenced the adoption of modern design thinking practices across teams to improve cross-functional cohesion.

bank_of_america.title: Bank of America Financial Tools
bank_of_america.challenge: Optimize enterprise financial tools for internal audit and compliance operations
bank_of_america.discovery: Facilitated design thinking workshops to align diverse stakeholders on workflow improvements
bank_of_america.strategy: Developed user journey maps and accessible patterns for internal audit tools
bank_of_america.outcome: Ensured alignment with complex regulatory requirements. Designed responsive interfaces for large-scale transaction data
bank_of_america.details: Facilitated design thinking workshops to align diverse stakeholders on workflow improvements for data-dense financial applications. Partnered with data teams to design responsive interfaces capable of processing large-scale transaction data.
